metadata.name: Redis Cache
metadata.description: This module deploys a Redis Cache.
The name of the private endpoint.
The resource ID of the private endpoint.
The group Id for the private endpoint Group.
FQDN that resolves to private endpoint IP address.
A list of private IP addresses of the private endpoint.
The custom DNS configurations of the private endpoint.
The IDs of the network interfaces associated with the private endpoint.
Required. Name of the access policy.
Required. Permissions associated with the access policy.
Optional. The name of the Access Policy Assignment.
Required. Object id to which the access policy will be assigned.
Required. Alias for the target object id.
Required. Name of the access policy to be assigned.
Required. The resource ID of the key vault where to store the secrets of this module.
Optional. The primaryAccessKey secret name to create.
Optional. The primaryConnectionString secret name to create.
Optional. The primaryStackExchangeRedisConnectionString secret name to create.
Optional. The secondaryAccessKey secret name to create.
Optional. The secondaryConnectionString secret name to create.
Optional. The secondaryStackExchangeRedisConnectionString secret name to create.
Optional. FQDN that resolves to private endpoint IP address.
Required. A list of private IP addresses of the private endpoint.
Required. The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group.
Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.
Required. The member name of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to.
Required. A private IP address obtained from the private endpoint's subnet.
Required. Properties of private endpoint IP configurations.
Optional. The name of the Private DNS Zone Group.
Optional. The name of the private DNS Zone Group config.
Required. The resource id of the private DNS zone.
Required. The private DNS Zone Groups to associate the Private Endpoint. A DNS Zone Group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
The resourceId of the exported secret.
The secret URI of the exported secret.
The secret URI with version of the exported secret.
An AVM-aligned type for the output of the secret set via the secrets export feature.
Optional. The name of the diagnostic setting.
Optional. Name of a Diagnostic Log category for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set the specific logs to collect here.
Optional. Name of a Diagnostic Log category group for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set to `allLogs` to collect all logs.
Optional. Enable or disable the category explicitly. Default is `true`.
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed. "allLogs" includes all possible logs for the resource. Set to `[]` to disable log collection.
Required. Name of a Diagnostic Metric category for a resource type this setting is applied to. Set to `AllMetrics` to collect all metrics.
Optional. Enable or disable the category explicitly. Default is `true`.
Optional. The name of metrics that will be streamed. "allMetrics" includes all possible metrics for the resource. Set to `[]` to disable metric collection.
Optional. A string indicating whether the export to Log Analytics should use the default destination type, i.e. AzureDiagnostics, or use a destination type.

Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic log analytics workspace. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.

Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic storage account. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.

Optional. Name of the diagnostic event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category. For security reasons, it is recommended to set diagnostic settings to send data to either storage account, log analytics workspace or event hub.
Optional. The full ARM resource ID of the Marketplace resource to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs.
An AVM-aligned type for a diagnostic setting. To be used if both logs & metrics are supported by the resource provider.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
An AVM-aligned type for a lock.
Optional. Enables system assigned managed identity on the resource.
Optional. The resource ID(s) to assign to the resource. Required if a user assigned identity is used for encryption.
An AVM-aligned type for a managed identity configuration. To be used if both a system-assigned & user-assigned identities are supported by the resource provider.
Optional. The name of the Private Endpoint.
Optional. The location to deploy the Private Endpoint to.
Optional. The name of the private link connection to create.
Optional. The subresource to deploy the Private Endpoint for. For example "vault" for a Key Vault Private Endpoint.
Required. Resource ID of the subnet where the endpoint needs to be created.
Optional. The resource ID of the Resource Group the Private Endpoint will be created in. If not specified, the Resource Group of the provided Virtual Network Subnet is used.
Optional. The private DNS Zone Group to configure for the Private Endpoint.
Optional. If Manual Private Link Connection is required.
Optional. A message passed to the owner of the remote resource with the manual connection request.
Optional. Custom DNS configurations.
Optional. A list of IP configurations of the Private Endpoint. This will be used to map to the first-party Service endpoints.
Optional. Application security groups in which the Private Endpoint IP configuration is included.
Optional. The custom name of the network interface attached to the Private Endpoint.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags to be applied on all resources/Resource Groups in this deployment.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.

An AVM-aligned type for a private endpoint. To be used if the private endpoint's default service / groupId can be assumed (i.e., for services that only have one Private Endpoint type like 'vault' for key vault).
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
An AVM-aligned type for a role assignment.
An exported secret's references.
A map of the exported secrets
Optional. The location to deploy the Redis cache service.
Required. The name of the Redis cache resource.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The managed identity definition for this resource.
Optional. Disable authentication via access keys.
Optional. Specifies whether the non-ssl Redis server port (6379) is enabled.
Optional. Requires clients to use a specified TLS version (or higher) to connect.
Optional. Whether or not public network access is allowed for this resource. For security reasons it should be disabled. If not specified, it will be disabled by default if private endpoints are set.

Optional. All Redis Settings. Few possible keys: rdb-backup-enabled,rdb-storage-connection-string,rdb-backup-frequency,maxmemory-delta,maxmemory-policy,notify-keyspace-events,maxmemory-samples,slowlog-log-slower-than,slowlog-max-len,list-max-ziplist-entries,list-max-ziplist-value,hash-max-ziplist-entries,hash-max-ziplist-value,set-max-intset-entries,zset-max-ziplist-entries,zset-max-ziplist-value etc.
Optional. Redis version. Only major version will be used in PUT/PATCH request with current valid values: (4, 6).
Optional. The number of replicas to be created per primary.
Optional. The number of replicas to be created per primary. Needs to be the same as replicasPerMaster for a Premium Cluster Cache.
Optional. The number of shards to be created on a Premium Cluster Cache.
Optional. The size of the Redis cache to deploy. Valid values: for C (Basic/Standard) family (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6), for P (Premium) family (1, 2, 3, 4).
Optional. The type of Redis cache to deploy.
Optional. Static IP address. Optionally, may be specified when deploying a Redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network; auto assigned by default.
Optional. The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network to deploy the Redis cache in.
Optional. A dictionary of tenant settings.
Optional. When true, replicas will be provisioned in availability zones specified in the zones parameter.
Optional. If the zoneRedundant parameter is true, replicas will be provisioned in the availability zones specified here. Otherwise, the service will choose where replicas are deployed.
Optional. Configuration details for private endpoints. For security reasons, it is recommended to use private endpoints whenever possible.

Optional. The geo-replication settings of the service. Requires a Premium SKU. Geo-replication is not supported on a cache with multiple replicas per primary. Secondary cache VM Size must be same or higher as compared to the primary cache VM Size. Geo-replication between a vnet and non vnet cache (and vice-a-versa) not supported.
Optional. The diagnostic settings of the service.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.
Optional. Array of access policies to create.
Optional. Array of access policy assignments.
Optional. The firewall rules to create in the PostgreSQL flexible server.
Optional. Key vault reference and secret settings for the module's secrets export.

variables.availabilityZones: [if(equals(parameters('skuName'), 'Premium'), if(parameters('zoneRedundant'), if(not(empty(parameters('zones'))), parameters('zones'), pickZones('Microsoft.Cache', 'redis', parameters('location'), 3)), createArray()), createArray())]
variables.formattedUserAssignedIdentities: [reduce(map(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'userAssignedResourceIds'), createArray()), lambda('id', createObject(format('{0}', lambdaVariables('id')), createObject()))), createObject(), lambda('cur', 'next', union(lambdaVariables('cur'), lambdaVariables('next'))))]
variables.identity: [if(not(empty(parameters('managedIdentities'))), createObject('type', if(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'systemAssigned'), false()), if(not(empty(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'userAssignedResourceIds'), createObject()))), 'SystemAssigned,UserAssigned', 'SystemAssigned'), if(not(empty(coalesce(tryGet(parameters('managedIdentities'), 'userAssignedResourceIds'), createObject()))), 'UserAssigned', 'None')), 'userAssignedIdentities', if(not(empty(variables('formattedUserAssignedIdentities'))), variables('formattedUserAssignedIdentities'), null())), null())]

properties.notes: [if(equals(tryGet(parameters('lock'), 'kind'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot delete or modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Redis Cache Access Policy
metadata.description: This module deploys an access policy for Redis Cache.
Required. The name of the Redis cache.
Required. The name of the access policy.
Required. Permissions associated with the access policy.
The name of the access policy.
The resource ID of the access policy.
The name of the resource group the access policy was created in.

metadata.name: Redis Cache Access Policy Assignment
metadata.description: This module deploys an access policy assignment for Redis Cache.
Required. The name of the Redis cache.
Required. Object ID to which the access policy will be assigned.
Optional. The name of the assignment. By default uses the Object ID to which the access policy will be assigned.
Required. Alias for the target object ID.
Required. Name of the access policy to be assigned.
The name of the access policy assignment.
The resource ID of the access policy assignment.
The name of the resource group the access policy assignment was created in.

parameters.privateLinkServiceConnections: [if(not(equals(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'isManualConnection'), true())), createObject('value', createArray(createObject('name', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'privateLinkServiceConnectionName'), format('{0}-{1}-{2}', last(split(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '/')), coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'redisCache'), copyIndex())), 'properties', createObject('privateLinkServiceId', resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), 'groupIds', createArray(coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'redisCache')))))), createObject('value', null()))]
parameters.manualPrivateLinkServiceConnections: [if(equals(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'isManualConnection'), true()), createObject('value', createArray(createObject('name', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'privateLinkServiceConnectionName'), format('{0}-{1}-{2}', last(split(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '/')), coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'redisCache'), copyIndex())), 'properties', createObject('privateLinkServiceId', resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), 'groupIds', createArray(coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'service'), 'redisCache')), 'requestMessage', coalesce(tryGet(coalesce(parameters('privateEndpoints'), createArray())[copyIndex()], 'manualConnectionRequestMessage'), 'Manual approval required.'))))), createObject('value', null()))]

metadata.name: Private Endpoints
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private Endpoint.
Optional. The name of the Private DNS Zone Group.
Required. The private DNS zone groups to associate the private endpoint. A DNS zone group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
Required. The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group.

Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. If used with private link service connection, this property must be defined as empty string.

Required. The member name of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. If used with private link service connection, this property must be defined as empty string.
Required. A private IP address obtained from the private endpoint's subnet.
Required. Properties of private endpoint IP configurations.
Required. The name of the private link service connection.

Required. The ID of a group obtained from the remote resource that this private endpoint should connect to. If used with private link service connection, this property must be defined as empty string array `[]`.
Required. The resource id of private link service.
Optional. A message passed to the owner of the remote resource with this connection request. Restricted to 140 chars.
Required. Properties of private link service connection.
Optional. FQDN that resolves to private endpoint IP address.
Required. A list of private IP addresses of the private endpoint.
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
An AVM-aligned type for a lock.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group config.
Required. The resource id of the private DNS zone.
Optional. The name (as GUID) of the role assignment. If not provided, a GUID will be generated.

Required. The role to assign. You can provide either the display name of the role definition, the role definition GUID, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
An AVM-aligned type for a role assignment.
Required. Name of the private endpoint resource to create.
Required. Resource ID of the subnet where the endpoint needs to be created.
Optional. Application security groups in which the private endpoint IP configuration is included.
Optional. The custom name of the network interface attached to the private endpoint.
Optional. A list of IP configurations of the private endpoint. This will be used to map to the First Party Service endpoints.
Optional. The private DNS zone group to configure for the private endpoint.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.
Optional. Tags to be applied on all resources/resource groups in this deployment.
Optional. Custom DNS configurations.

Conditional. A grouping of information about the connection to the remote resource. Used when the network admin does not have access to approve connections to the remote resource. Required if `privateLinkServiceConnections` is empty.
Conditional. A grouping of information about the connection to the remote resource. Required if `manualPrivateLinkServiceConnections` is empty.
Optional. Enable/Disable usage telemetry for module.

metadata.name: Private Endpoint Private DNS Zone Groups
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private Endpoint Private DNS Zone Group.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group config.
Required. The resource id of the private DNS zone.
Conditional. The name of the parent private endpoint. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. Array of private DNS zone configurations of the private DNS zone group. A DNS zone group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group.
The name of the private endpoint DNS zone group.
The resource ID of the private endpoint DNS zone group.
The resource group the private endpoint DNS zone group was deployed into.
The resource group the private endpoint was deployed into.
The resource ID of the private endpoint.
The name of the private endpoint.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The custom DNS configurations of the private endpoint.
The resource IDs of the network interfaces associated with the private endpoint.
The group Id for the private endpoint Group.

metadata.name: Redis Cache Firewall Rules
metadata.description: This module creates a firewall rule for Redis Cache.
Required. Redis cache name.
Required. The name of the Redis Cache Firewall Rule.
Required. The start IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Use value '0.0.0.0' for all Azure-internal IP addresses.
Required. The end IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Must be greater than or equal to startIpAddress. Use value '0.0.0.0' for all Azure-internal IP addresses.
The name of the deployed firewall rule.
The resource ID of the deployed firewall rule.
The resource group of the deployed firewall rule.

metadata.name: Redis Cache Linked Servers
metadata.description: This module connects a primary and secondary Redis Cache together for geo-replication.
Required. Primary Redis cache name.
Optional. The name of the secondary Redis cache. If not provided, the primary Redis cache name is used.
Required. The resource ID of the linked server.
Optional. The location of the linked server. If not provided, the location of the primary Redis cache is used.
Optional. The role of the linked server. Possible values include: "Primary", "Secondary". Default value is "Secondary".
The name of the linkedServer resource.
The resource ID of the linkedServer.
The hostname of the linkedServer.
The resource group of the deployed linkedServer.

secretsToSet.value: [union(createArray(), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'primaryAccessKeyName'), createArray(createObject('name', tryGet(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'primaryAccessKeyName'), 'value', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '2024-11-01').primaryKey)), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'primaryConnectionStringName'), createArray(createObject('name', tryGet(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'primaryConnectionStringName'), 'value', format('rediss://:{0}@{1}:6380', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '2024-11-01').primaryKey, reference('redis').hostName))), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'primaryStackExchangeRedisConnectionStringName'), createArray(createObject('name', tryGet(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'primaryStackExchangeRedisConnectionStringName'), 'value', format('{0}:6380,password={1},ssl=True,abortConnect=False', reference('redis').hostName, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '2024-11-01').primaryKey))), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'secondaryAccessKeyName'), createArray(createObject('name', tryGet(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'secondaryAccessKeyName'), 'value', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '2024-11-01').secondaryKey)), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'secondaryConnectionStringName'), createArray(createObject('name', tryGet(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'secondaryConnectionStringName'), 'value', format('rediss://:{0}@{1}:6380', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '2024-11-01').secondaryKey, reference('redis').hostName))), createArray()), if(contains(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'secondaryStackExchangeRedisConnectionStringName'), createArray(createObject('name', tryGet(parameters('secretsExportConfiguration'), 'secondaryStackExchangeRedisConnectionStringName'), 'value', format('{0}:6380,password={1},ssl=True,abortConnect=False', reference('redis').hostName, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Cache/redis', parameters('name')), '2024-11-01').secondaryKey))), createArray()))]

metadata.description: The resourceId of the exported secret.
The secret URI of the exported secret.
The secret URI with version of the exported secret.
An AVM-aligned type for the output of the secret set via the secrets export feature.
Required. The name of the secret to set.
Required. The value of the secret to set.
An AVM-aligned type for the secret to set via the secrets export feature.
Required. The name of the Key Vault to set the secrets in.
Required. The secrets to set in the Key Vault.
The references to the secrets exported to the provided Key Vault.
The name of the Redis Cache.
The resource ID of the Redis Cache.
The name of the resource group the Redis Cache was created in.
Redis hostname.
Redis SSL port.
The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network where the Redis Cache was deployed in.
The principal ID of the system assigned identity.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The private endpoints of the Redis Cache.
A hashtable of references to the secrets exported to the provided Key Vault. The key of each reference is each secret's name.
